title: ‘बिना लक्षण वाले मरीज़ों से नहीं फैलता कोरोना’, अब WHO ऐसा कोई दावा नहीं करता
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: “Since early February, we have said that asymptomatic people can transmit #COVID19, but that we need more research to establish the extent of asymptomatic transmission. That research is ongoing”-@DrTedros
